name: NinjaTeam Header Footer Custom Code
author: Ninja Team

sections.description:
This plugin help you easy to insert CSS, JavaScript and any codes to or before , for example Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, custom CSS, and much more. No need to edit your theme files, don’t lost your code when upgrade your theme. This is must have plugin for your WordPress website.

If you to know how to add code to header in WordPress, or looking for wordpress plugin to add code to header, you go right place, this plugin help you do it.

FEATURES

  • Easy to insert code to header and footer
  • Add Google Analytics code to any theme
  • Add custom CSS to any theme
  • Add Facebook Pixel to any theme
  • Friendly
  • Support code editor
  • And more…

INSTALLATION

Manual installation is easy and takes fewer than one minute.

  1. Download the plugin from wordpress.org, unpack it and upload the [NinjaTeam Insert Code Header Footer] folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins‘ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to your main WordPress menu > Header Footer Code to add your custom code.

You’re done. Enjoy.
